parameters: \n<Guild Member>When I was younger, I used to hoard all the
items I would find while exploring. However, my
adventuring days are long over, so I figure it's
for the best to get everything off my hands.
\n<Guild Member>Would you like to buy anything from me?
I have some rather... exclusive items.
\n<Guild Member>Alright... I'll be here if you change your mind.
\n<Guild Member>I have plenty... let's see what I brought in today.

\vilI'm afraid that we cannot allow non-members

Craft something at this... random anvil?
\n<Guild Member>Buying a membership to the Adventurer's
Guild was a good idea. We dock in Telluria
Castle Town a lot, so I figured a permanent
quiet spot to eat would be a good investment.
\n<Captain>I've sailed the world and learned a lot of things from
a lot of people. Want me to share a bag organization
trick with you? It'll hide ingredients and weak
healing items from your bag during battle.
\n<Captain>There you go. Looking through your bag
in battle should be a lot easier now.
\n<Captain>Want your bag to go back to normal?
\n<Captain>Come back if you'd ever like to re-organize.
\n<Captain>There you go. Looking through your bag
in battle should be a lot easier now.
